description: This joke plays on the literal interpretation of 'playing piano by ear', leading to a humorous and light-hearted revelation.
title: The Pianist's Revelation
n_1: Leo sits at the piano, looking perplexed, trying to figure out how to play.
n_2: Leo leans his ear against the piano keys, trying to 'play'.
n_3: Mia demonstrates the correct way to play, using hands.
n_4: Leo successfully plays a melody, both enjoying the music.
c1_1: They say you can play piano by ear, right?
c2_2: No, no, let me show you!
c2_3: There you go, use your hands!
